name: The Biba Collection
description:
Biba Ventures is on a mission to get today’s screen-savvy kids OUTSIDE and ACTIVE. Our games integrate digital and physical playtime and get parents and kids playing together in a fit and adventurous way.

Biba games take on the problem of youth sedentariness and screen-fixation and turn it into healthy, active gameplay. Leveraging augmented reality and playful imagination, Biba games can be played on any playground, however, there are some benefits to playing on a Biba Playground, including markers which can unlock new content, activate mini-games and reveal treasures when scanned.

Biba’s library of apps is listed by the kidSAFE Seal Program. The kidSAFE Seal Program is an independent safety certification service and seal-of-approval program designed exclusively for children-friendly websites and technologies, including online game sites, educational services, virtual worlds, social networks, mobile apps, tablet devices, connected toys, and other similar online and interactive services. Click on the seal or go to www.kidsafeseal.com for more information.
